title: [Women in Tech] It is critical to begin early, to educate and train women, says Zahra Ladha of Tredence - YourStory
content: [Women in Tech] It is critical to begin early, to educate and train women, says Zahra Ladha of Tredence  YourStory
description: Creating a culture of belonging and equal opportunity for women will help retain them in the workforce, says Zohra Ladha of Tredence.
